meta.name: viewport
meta.title: New: 10 animated line backgrounds | SVG Backgrounds

meta.name: description
meta.content: The designs feature lines in stripe-, grid-, and ring- formations, with low-motion animations to keep the designs subtle and suitable for use as backgrounds.
ðŸ‘‰ The designs feature lines in stripe-, grid-, and ring- formations, with low-motion animations to keep the designs subtle and suitable for use as backgrounds.

meta.name: theme-color

div.p: Hey, I'm Matt , the creator behind SVG Backgrounds. I produce free and paid resources every month, sign up for alerts.
